name: Basement (itch) (TombikKus)
description:
You are in a basement with something that appears to be an old generator with a note on it. The door is locked. What are you going to do?

 

WARNING: THIS GAME CONTAINS FLASHING IMAGES, LOUD SOUNDS  AND JUMPSCARES.

Warning: This game is a prototype. Bugs may occur. 

PLEASE COMMENT TO SHARE YOUR THOUGHTS WITH ME.
